original_text: I gave your master's palace to you, and his wives as well. I gave the kingdoms of Israel and Judah to you. And if that was not enough for you, I would have given you even more than that.
korean_text: 네 주인의 집을 네게 주고 네 주인의 아내들을 네 품에 두고 이스라엘과 유다 족속을 네게 맡겼느니라 만일 그것이 부족하였을 것 같으면 내가 네게 이것 저것을 더 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: I gave your master's palace to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 주인의 궁을 너에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: I gave the kingdoms of Israel and Judah to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이스라엘과 유다 왕국을 너에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: And if that was not enough for you
I would have given you even more than that
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 그것보다 훨씬 더 많은 것을 주었을 것이다
